simulator
Class VSSimulator

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  simulator.VSSimulator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, VSSerializable
public class VSSimulator
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements VSSerializable

The class VSSimulator, an object of this class represents a whole simulator. It may be, that several parallel simulators exist. They are independent fron each other.

Author:
Paul C. Buetow
See Also:
Serialized Form
